text:
="preserve">Antonis Georgiadis (, 25 January 1933 – 16 November 2020) was a Greek football player and manager. He was born in Drama, Greece. From 1950 to 1960, he played for Doxa Drama. From 1989 to 1992, he managed the national team.
Georgiadis died in Drama on 16 November 2020 at the age of 87.
